snippet.title: Fable 1996: Truncated Gameplay
snippet.description:
This is "Fable" made by Simbiosis Interactive back in 1996. This is not to be confused with that newer, more popular Fable. This is an old-school point-and-click type of adventure game.

I got my hands on the CD version, which has full voice acting. I really enjoyed this game. If you like these videos, share them. Otherwise, this game will forever remain lost in obscurity.

Here's where to get the game if you want to download and play it yourself: http://www.oldgames.sk/en/game/fable/download/2623/

It costs 1.40 Euros, which is $2 when converted to US currency.  You have the option of getting a premium account there for however long, but I don't suggest giving them your bank account information (just in case, you know).  Play it safe and use the PayPal option.

Also, check out the annotated playthrough (annotations done by viewers like you).  Here's the link to the Playlist:
http://www.youtube.com/view_play_list?p=B018AD4C0FBD6566

Thanks for watching! :D

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Click here to download my playthrough of the game (watch, recut, make YouTube Poop, etc):
http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=33100a552d99ab85aaca48175a79d1c343b489863d14f23e4d71ee60c1ce7296
